title: Continuous Distribution and its Third Quartile
text: The formula for computing third quartile is 3rd Quartile $$=$$ $$n+1$$ * $$\frac{3}{4}$$, where $$n$$ is the number of datas in the set
speech: The formula for computing third quartile is 3rd Quartile  is equal to   n plus, 1  *  3 fourths , where  n  is the number of datas in the set
